full_output.summary: Proficient multitasker with an exceptional work ethic and outstanding collaboration, problem-solving, and organizational abilities. I am consistently eager to assume extra responsibilities to accomplish team objectives. As a dependable and committed team player, I tackle every task with diligence and ingenuity.

projects.name: Shared Wheels - A Carpooling site
projects.description: Developed a carpooling webpage to connect commuters for shared rides, reducing travel costs and environmental impact. Implemented features like ride matching, user profiles, and scheduling, enabling users to plan and organize trips in advance. Enhanced user experience by innovative solutions to promote efficient carpooling.

projects.name: Fake Review Detection
projects.description: Developed a model using BERT and BiLSTM to detect fake reviews with high precision. Performed data analysis, preprocessing, and feature engineering to improve model accuracy. Trained and fine-tuned the model, achieving a 90.5% accuracy in distinguishing between fake and genuine reviews.

projects.name: Voice Assistant
projects.description: Developed a voice assistant to recognize and respond to user commands using speech recognition technology. Integrated Python libraries for voice recognition, natural language processing, and text-to-speech functionality. Created a system that delivers accurate responses to user commands through efficient speech processing.

experiences.description: Developed a model to analyze car manufacturing data, performed exploratory data analysis, and applied machine learning algorithms to enhance car recommendations based on user specifications and budget. Optimized the model to deliver precise and tailored recommendations for users.
Proposed custom applications with Apex and Lightning Web Components, improving functionality on the Salesforce platform.

full_output.name: Gopala krishna Parimi
